main event: Many people saw four circular objects near Santa Cruz, Calif. at 2300 hours on 22 July 1952.
interesting points: A blotchy trail was visible behind the objects, indicating a high speed,The objects were seen changing positions and chasing each other,The objects were about the size of a B-17 aircraft,The first observation was made at 2240 PDT and lost at 2345 PDT,The observer was notified by numerous other people including the police.
sighted object: four circular objects in the sky
witness description: various people including a ground observer
